cosc345.app.model

Class Interval

  • java.lang.Object
    • cosc345.app.model.Playable
      • cosc345.app.model.Interval

  • public class Interval
extends Playable
    Represents a musical interval.

      • randomInterval

        public static Interval randomInterval()
        Generate a random interval, with a random root note.
        Returns:
        a new Interval object with the root note and interval type chosen randomly.

      • randomInterval

        public static Interval randomInterval(Note root)
        Generate a random interval, with a given root note.
        Parameters:
        root - the root note of the interval to create.
        Returns:
        a new Interval object with the interval type chosen randomly.

      • onDone

        protected void onDone()
        Description copied from class: Playable
        Handle any cleanup that needs to be done after playback is finished and notify the delegate that playback has finished. This should be called when the Playable object has finished playback or the Playable object was stopped.
        Overrides:
        onDone in class Playable
